summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的更新位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the update location for the application.

value.span: 指示应用程序更新位置的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the update location for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此属性，则不会为应用程序定义任何更新位置。If this property is not specified, no update location will be defined for the application. 但是，如果指定了应用程序更新，则必须指定更新位置。However, if application updates are specified, the update location must be specified. 指定的值应为完全限定的 URL 或通用命名约定（UNC）路径。The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.

member this.DisallowUrlActivation : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应阻止通过 URL 启动应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application should be blocked from being started by means of a URL.

value.span: 如果阻止通过 URL 启动应用程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application is blocked from being started by means of a URL otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true`此选项，则仅可从用户的 "**开始**" 菜单启动应用程序。If this option is `true`, the application can only be started from the user's **Start** menu. 默认为 `false`。The default is `false`. 如果 `false`，则忽略此选项。This option is ignored if is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Install { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Install : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应用程序是已安装应用程序还是仅联机应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is an installed application or an online-only application.

value.span: 如果应用程序是已安装应用程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application is an installed application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则该应用程序将安装在用户的 "**开始**" 菜单上，并且可以通过使用控制面板中的 "**添加或删除程序**" 将其删除。If this property is set to `true`, the application will be installed on the user's **Start** menu, and it can be removed by using **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel. 默认为 `true`。The default is `true`. 如果将此属性设置为 "`false`"，则应用程序将从网页联机使用并且仅在联机时可用。If this property is set to `false`, the application is intended for online use from a Web page and is available online only. > [!NOTE] > 对于 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序，必须将 属性设置为 `true`，并且还必须将 设置为 `false`。For WPF Web Browser Applications, you must set the property to `true`, and you must also set to `false`. 如果不满足此条件，您将收到[MSBuild 错误 MSB3116](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb383983(v=vs.140))。If this condition is not met, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb383983(v=vs.140)).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MapFileExtensions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.MapFileExtensions : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用 .deploy 文件扩展名映射。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether .deploy file extension mapping is used.

value.span: 如果使用 .deploy 文件扩展名映射，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if .deploy file extension mapping is used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则将使用 .deploy 文件扩展名发布每个程序文件。If this property is set to `true`, every program file is published with a .deploy file extension. 此设置对 Web 服务器安全非常有用，可以限制必须取消阻止的文件扩展名以启用 ClickOnce 应用程序部署。This setting is useful for Web server security to limit the number of file extensions that have to be unblocked to enable ClickOnce application deployment. 默认为 `false`。The default is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MinimumRequiredVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MinimumRequiredVersion : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置所需的应用程序的最低版本号。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum required version number for an application.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示所需的应用程序的最低版本号。

span.span: A string indicating the minimum required version number for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户的计算机的应用程序版本低于此属性指定的所需最低版本，则用户将无法选择跳过更新。If the user's computer has a version of the application that is lower than the minimum required version specified by this property, the user will not have the option to skip the update. 默认情况下，不需要最低版本。The default is to have no minimum required version. 仅当 设置为 `true`时，此输入才适用。This input applies only when is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Product { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Product : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.

value.span: 指示应用程序的名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有为此属性指定任何值，则将从生成的清单的标识中推断该名称。If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest. 此名称用于 "**开始**" 菜单上的快捷方式名称，并且是显示在 "控制面板" 的 "**添加或删除程序**" 中的名称的一部分。This name is used for the shortcut name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Publisher { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Publisher : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的发布者。

span.span: Gets or sets the publisher of the application.

value.span: 表示应用程序的发布者的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the publisher of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有为此属性指定任何值，则将从已注册的用户或生成的清单的标识中推断该名称。If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the registered user or from the identity of the generated manifest. 此名称用于 "**开始**" 菜单上的文件夹名称，是在 "控制面板" 的 "**添加或删除程序**" 中显示的名称的一部分。This name is used for the folder name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应用程序是否可以使用 URL 查询字符串参数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether URL query-string parameters are available to the application.

value.span: 如果应用程序可以使用 URL 查询字符串参数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if URL query-string parameters are available to the application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则可向应用程序提供 URL 查询字符串参数。If this property is set to `true`, URL query-string parameters are available to the application. 默认值为 `false`，指定参数将不能用于应用程序。The default is `false`, specifying that parameters will not be available to the application.

member this.UpdateEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示应用程序是否可更新的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is updatable.

value.span: 如果应该程序可更新，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application is updatable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则可以更新该应用程序。If this property is set to `true`, the application is updatable. 默认为 `false`。The default is `false`. 仅当 设置为 `true`时，此输入才适用。This input applies only when is set to `true`.

member this.UpdateInterval : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的更新间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the update interval for the application.

value.span: 一个整数，指示应用程序的更新间隔。

span.span: An integer that indicates the update interval for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 0。The default is zero. 仅当 和 均设置为 `true`时，此输入才适用。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode UpdateMode { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象表示是在应用程序启动之前在前台检查更新，还是在应用程序运行时在后台检查更新。

span.span: Gets or sets an object indicating whether updates should be checked in the foreground before the application is started, or in the background while the application is running.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示是在应用程序启动之前，还是应用程序运行时检查更新。

span.span: An object that indicates whether updates should be checked before the application is started, or while the application is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `Foreground`，将在前台检查更新。If this property is set to `Foreground`, updates are checked in the foreground. 默认为 `Background`。The default is `Background`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 仅当 和 均设置为 `true`时，此输入才适用。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于 属性的单位。

span.span: Gets or sets the units used for the property.

value.span: 一个 对象，指示用于 属性的单位。

span.span: An object that indicates the units used for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下值适用于用于更新间隔的单位： `Days`、`Hours`和 `Weeks`。The following values are available for the units used for the update interval: `Days`, `Hours`, and `Weeks`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 仅当 和 均设置为 `true`时，此输入才适用。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.
